document_data.caption: A map showing the Soaring Pegasus outlined in red.
document_data.name: Soaring Pegasus
document_data.mainbody: The '''Soaring Pegasus''' was a [[tavern]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The tavern stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Soaring Pegasus was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] on the west side of the intersection of where [[Sail Street]] joined [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]].
